txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Tough carapaces from the spiders of the Lone-lands. Deliver them to me, Gadaric Munce, at The Forsaken Inn, you will earn our favour.
'We are not very good with weapons, though some of us were warriors once, and we have long waited to see the spiders fall.\n\n'Thank you.'
'The spiders of the ruins have long been our enemy, and their chitin is hard. If you will help us, you will earn our favour.'
Gadaric Munce of the Eglain offers favour with his people if one can collect tough carapaces from the spiders in the Lone-lands.
Deliver the tough carapaces to Gadaric Munce at The Forsaken Inn
You accepted a task from Gadaric Munce to acquire tough carapaces from the spiders within the Lone-lands. You can find Gadaric within The Forsaken Inn.
Wanted: Tough carapaces from the spiders of the Lone-lands.
